name: The Blur
description: You've seen bubbly brunch drinks before, but this tart lime variation, served at San Francisco's Nopa (one of our favorite Bay Area brunch spots) is a bit unusual, made with herbal Green Chartreuse and maraschino liqueur to sweeten.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces freshly squeezed lime juice, from 1 to 2 limes
Cava or other dry sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: Add Chartreuse, maraschino, and lime to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into two Champagne flutes, dividing evenly. Top each flute with Cava and serve.
